import gsap from "gsap"; import React, { useEffect } from "react"; const Aims = () => { useEffect(() => { gsap.fromTo( ".anim-line--top", { width: 0 }, { width: "100%", delay: 3.5, duration: 1 } ); gsap.fromTo( ".anim-line--right", { height: 0 }, { height: "100%", delay: 3.5, duration: 1 } ); }, []); return (
